sentences.english: McConnell said Republicans would fight the health-care legislation as hard as they could.
sentences.chinese: 麥康奈爾說，共和黨人將竭盡全力反對健保法案。

sentences.english: My daughter is an engineer in Cornel, and that's their dorm.
sentences.chinese: 我的女兒是康奈爾大學的工程師，這是他們的宿舍。

sentences.english: Bustamante, a professor of computational biology at Cornell University.
sentences.chinese: 康奈爾大學計算生物學教授巴斯塔曼特這樣說。

sentences.english: But ultimately it was Cornell for me because of the community and the people.
sentences.chinese: 我最終選擇了康奈爾是因爲那裏的社區和人。

sentences.english: Dr. Xiaojing Ma of Cornell University Medical College announces the winners of the lucky draw.
sentences.chinese: 康奈爾大學醫學院馬小京教授爲幸運觀衆抽獎。

sentences.english: So, why did you choose Cornell?
sentences.chinese: 那你爲什麼選擇康奈爾呢？

sentences.english: I decided to come to Cornell for a number of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 我決定來康奈爾大學有很多原因。

sentences.english: Obviously, it has an academic reputation, you know.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，康奈爾有學術名聲。

sentences.english: Cornel University is the third college I visited in New York.
sentences.chinese: 康奈爾大學是我在紐約探訪的第三所大學。

sentences.english: And she received a PHD electro-engineering from Cornell.
sentences.chinese: 並獲得了康奈爾大學電子工程系的博士學位。

sentences.english: The work at Cornell is testing hypotheses of insect propulsion and control.
sentences.chinese: 在康奈爾大學的工作是測試昆蟲的推進力和可控性。

sentences.english: It was actually my dad's building, and it's called Cornell Street Studio.
sentences.chinese: 其實那是我老爸的房子，名字叫康奈爾大街工作室。

sentences.english: Cornell's troops turned Dartmouth's militia into a vassal force.
sentences.chinese: 康奈爾大軍臣服了達特茅斯國民軍。

sentences.english: Prasad, a professor of trade policy at Cornell University.
sentences.chinese: Prasad說，“他是康奈爾大學的貿易政策教授。

sentences.english: 'This fight is long from over, ' Mr. McConnell said.
sentences.chinese: 麥康奈爾說，這場紛爭遠遠沒有結束。

sentences.english: Mitch McConnell might even have something to say about China policy at that point.
sentences.chinese: 麥康奈爾甚至可能有話要說，在這一點上中國的政策。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: chair (or president, speaker etc) of national congress
member of the US House of Representatives

pinyin: Ma2 sheng3 Li3 gong1 Xue2 yuan4
